title: Breaking, Singing, Pulling Away
itunes:title: Breaking, Singing, Pulling Away
description: Friends, one of the best known stories in Western culture is the narrative of Christ’s Passion and death. However, this very familiarity can block our understanding of the account. What I want to do in this homily is to draw your attention to three odd details of Mark’s Gospel, each of which packs a punch spiritually.
